description.narrative: The aim of the project is development and introduction of an innovative model of support for people suffering from alcohol addiction through opening a social enterprise in Minsk - a workshop for manufacturing plaster products (souvenir figurines etc.) wher e alcohol dependent persons just started to attend AA groups will be trained and employed. The project consists of the following phases: 1) registration of a social enterprise founded by the NGO Healthy Choice 2) rent of premises and their equipment suitab le for producing plaster figurines selection and training of the staff 1 coordinator + 5 full-time workers (AA members who maintain sobriety 5-6 months) and 5 trainees (recent AA members) production and sales of plaster figurines implementation of effectiv e system of support evaluation and supervision, 3) special support for families especially children of Minsk district AA members through social activities (workshops on decoupage and painting plaster figurines), 3) sharing information on the experience on social entrerprise to Belarussian regions trough 5 visits (Gomel Baran Shklov Lida Barnovichi) and web.
